me rate palanaya wenas kirimata athamunta awashyawa athath janathawa apa samanga sitina thuru me aanduwa wenas karannata kisidu balawegayakata nohaki bawa janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha awadharanaya kaleya.widesha balawega gasana gasana padayata natannata wathman aanduwa sudanam nathi bawa pawasu janadhipathiwaraya janathawa 2016 wana thuru rata palanaya kirimata aanduwata balaya di athi bawin kawuruth kiyana aakarayata katayuthu kirimata adahasak nomathi bawath pawasiya.janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha mese prakasha kale elambaena basnahira ha dakuna palath sabha mathiwaranaye jayagrahanaya thahawuru kirima sandaha palath deka pura pawathwena jayagrahi rali malawe dewannata rathmalana, dumriya kridanganaye di eeye (10) ekwemini.janathawa dun balaya paridi 2016 di mathiwaranayakata ya haki bawa penwa dun janadhipathiwaraya thama kisiwiteka mathiwaranawalata biya nathi bawath wipakshayata awashya nam mathiwaranayakata ya haki bawath prakasha kaleya.athamunta awashyawa aththe le ganga gala yana samajayak yali dakinnata wuwath eyata ida thabannata thama sudanam nomathi bawath me rate janathawage jiwath wime ayithiya raka dime wagakima thama sathu bawath janadhipathiwaraya pawasiya.kiyannata deyak nomathi tharamatama bankoloth wi athi wipakshaya noyek katha kiyana bawa pawasu janadhipathiwaraya apata janathawata ho parlimenthuwata ho sangawimata kisiwak nomathi bawa prakasha kaleya.kisidu minisaku sira karagena punaruththapanaya kirimata nohaki bawa penwa dun janadhipathiwaraya minisun punaruththapanaya kirimata hondama thana samajaya bawath 24,000kata wadi thrasthawadin samajayata yomu kale ee nisa bawath kiweya.amathiwarun wana maithripala sirisena, susil premajayantha, jiwan kumaranathunga, wimal wirawansha, patali champika ranawaka, niyojya amathi mohan lal greru, rathmalana sama sanwidhayaka chandana kathriaarachchi mahathwarun athulu pirisak da me awasthawata ekwa sitiyaha..

departhamenthuwata bandimata athi mulika sudusukama upadhiyak darima dakwa ihala nanwana lada athara danata departhamenthuwata bandawa ganu labanne depala kalamanakaranaya saha thakserukaranaya pilibanda widya upadhi (wishesha) darannan pamani. 2006 aprel masa 3 wana dina, depala kalamanakaranaya saha thakserukaranaya pilibanda gaurawa upadhidhari saha tharushakaී upadhidhari wana pi.dab. senarathna mahatha shri lankiya sudusukamak laba pradhana thakserukaru dhuraya hebawu palamuwanna bawata pathwiya.

shri lankawata ayath nangenahira muhudu thiraye sita bangladeshaye chithagon dakwa diwena thawamath hari hati dhiwara asa nogatunu noindul mathsya sampatha pitarata yawimen rupiyal miliyana dasadahasakata wada aadayamak upaya ganimata merata dhiwarayanta awasthawa udawi thibe.ampara, thrikunamalaya ha madakalapuwa disthrik thune dhiwara katayuthuwalin ratata wadima widesha winimaya pramanayak upaya ganimata awasthawa udawi atha.wisheshayen ampara disthrikkaye dhiwara janathawata gambauru muhude mathsyasampatha ooluwil dhiwara warayen ha ooluwil jathyanthara warayen pitaratata yawa me aakarayata aadayam wadi kara ganimata hakiyawa labena bawa ampara disthrik shri lanka nidahas paksha sanwidhayaka kirthi shri wirasinha mahatha prakasha kaleya.sathwani dayata kirula jathika sanwardhana wadapiliwela ha pradarshanayen ampare janathawata athwana aarthika prathilabha monawadayi apa kala wimasimakata pilithuru labademin kirthi shri wirasinha mahatha me adahas pala kaleya.'dayata kirula kiyanne ampara janathawata lokaya dina ganimata labunu awasthawak.
